content: Add error pattern matching infrastructure - create struct/enum for known error patterns
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings
Add registry checking function for serialization validation using bevy_registry_schema
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings
Add specific conversion functions for known patterns (Transform, Name, Vec3/Quat)
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings
Create tiered dispatcher function to replace try_component_format_alternatives
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings
Replace calls to try_component_format_alternatives with new tiered dispatcher
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings
Enhance debug_info reporting to show which tier was used and specific actions taken
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings
Run cargo clippy with strict warnings and fix any issues
Fix clippy issues - remove dead code, remove unused variables/arguments, do not use _ prefixes or allow attributes
Run cargo +nightly fmt to format code
Run cargo nextest run to test changes
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
Task subagent to do code review focusing on duplication and complexity - read and analyze only, no modifications
STOP and review suggested changes with user when subagent returns
